metadata.synopsis: Jaheira has seen you attack her allies (specifically general allies like Harpers or her animal friends - Minsc/her family have specific reactions) and gradually loses patience with you. This is the AD variant incase she can't get you in conversation.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Attack harpers in Act 2/3- Attack the animals in Jaheira's Basement

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: Whatever tadpole trickery you have employed - you will not do it again.

1.speaker: Jaheira
1.text: Careful who it is you turn your ire on. I will not stand by while you attack allies.

2.speaker: Jaheira
2.text: Some twisting of the tadpole to have me turn my blades against my own? No more - you are no better than these cultists.

3.speaker: Jaheira
3.text: I made myself clear - and I am not in the habit of offering second chances. Our paths part here - I only hope one of us has the means to finish this fight.
